Module com.example.software2
Package com.example.software2.Controllers

Class CustomerandAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.software2.Controllers.CustomerandAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerandAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main page of the application which display's customer and appointment data in TableViews. Contains all CRUD operations. Initializes all data upon load.

    • deleteAppointmentHandler

      public void deleteAppointmentHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes the selected appointment. Displays an alert box if an appointment isn't selected. Displays a success message if an appointment is selected and deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • deleteCustomerHandler

      public void deleteCustomerHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Deletes the selected customer if that customer does not have any appointments. Otherwise it will display an error message.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      SQLException
